fields.title: Allergist/Immunologist
fields.des: Diagnoses and treats allergies, asthma, and immune system disorders.

fields.title: Anesthesiologist
fields.des: Administers anesthesia and manages pain during and after surgical procedures.

fields.title: Cardiologist
fields.des: Specializes in diagnosing and treating heart and blood vessel conditions.

fields.title: Dermatologist
fields.des: Treats skin, hair, and nail disorders.

fields.title: Endocrinologist
fields.des: Treats hormone-related disorders such as diabetes and thyroid issues.

fields.title: Gastroenterologist
fields.des: Specializes in digestive system disorders.

fields.title: Hematologist
fields.des: Treats blood disorders and diseases.

fields.title: Infectious Disease Specialist
fields.des: Diagnoses and treats infectious diseases.

fields.title: Internist
fields.des: Provides comprehensive care for adults, often serving as primary care physicians.

fields.title: Nephrologist
fields.des: Specializes in kidney care and treating kidney diseases.

fields.title: Neurologist
fields.des: Treats disorders of the nervous system, including the brain and spinal cord.

fields.title: Obstetrician/Gynecologist (OB/GYN)
fields.des: Provides care related to pregnancy, childbirth, and female reproductive health.

fields.title: Oncologist
fields.des: Specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of cancer.

fields.title: Ophthalmologist
fields.des: Treats eye disorders and performs eye surgery.

fields.title: Orthopedic Surgeon
fields.des: Treats musculoskeletal system issues, including bones, joints, and muscles.

fields.title: Otolaryngologist (ENT)
fields.des: Treats conditions of the ear, nose, and throat.

fields.title: Pediatrician
fields.des: Provides medical care for infants, children, and adolescents.

fields.title: Psychiatrist
fields.des: Diagnoses and treats mental health disorders.

fields.title: Pulmonologist
fields.des: Treats lung and respiratory system disorders.

fields.title: Radiologist
fields.des: Uses medical imaging to diagnose and treat diseases.

fields.title: Rheumatologist
fields.des: Treats autoimmune diseases and disorders of the joints and soft tissues.

fields.title: Surgeon
fields.des: Performs surgical procedures to treat diseases, injuries, or deformities.

fields.title: Urologist
fields.des: Treats conditions of the urinary tract and male reproductive system.
